mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE hourlySequence AS ( SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -((#{days} * 24) - 1) HOUR) AS hour_time UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(hour_time, INTERVAL 1 hour) FROM hourlySequence WHERE hour_time < NOW() ) select a.name, c.hour_time as time, sum(if((a.id = b.hr_id and substr(b.create_date, 1, 13) = substr(c.hour_time, 1, 13)), 1, 0)) as count from hr as a, operator_log as b, hourlySequence as c where b.type != 'GET' group by a.id, c.hour_time
